title: SpongeBob Tower Defense Tier List
description: Explore the latest tier list for SpongeBob Tower Defense, ranking units from S to C Tier based on their performance and abilities.
heading: SpongeBob Tower Defense Tier List
introText: Explore the latest tier list for SpongeBob Tower Defense, ranking units from S to C Tier based on their performance and abilities.

data.itemDescription: A secret unit known for its high damage output and resilience on the battlefield
A secret unit that deals 7,000 splash damage with a 1-second attack speed and a range of 28, attacking by lunging at enemies entering its radius
A secret unit combines advanced weaponry with strategic abilities, making it a formidable presence
A Legendary unit known for his area-of-effect attacks that slow down enemies, allowing other units to deal more damage effectively
A Mythic unit with high damage output and durability, making her a formidable presence on the battlefield
Another Mythic unit offering unique abilities that can significantly impact the course of battles
A Mythic unit that provides strong support capabilities, enhancing the effectiveness of other units

A Legendary unit with solid offensive capabilities and decent support skills, making him a versatile choice for various strategies. Offers solid offensive capabilities with his ghostly attacks and can phase through obstacles
A Mythic unit known for his powerful attacks and commanding presence on the battlefield
A Mythic unit with balanced attributes, offering both offensive and defensive utilities
A Legendary unit that brings a mix of attack power and resilience, suitable for various tactical approaches
An Epic unit with moderate stats, providing reliable support in mid-game scenarios
A Rare unit offering specific utilities that can be beneficial in certain situations
A Legendary unit with unique abilities, though not as impactful as higher-tier units
A Legendary unit with niche applications, effective when used strategically
A Rare unit with limited effectiveness, best utilized in early-game stages
An Epic unit whose abilities are situational, making her less reliable in general gameplay
A Rare unit with below-average performance, often outclassed by higher-tier units
A Rare unit with minimal impact, suitable primarily for collection purposes
